HediffDef.label: celestia civilian mechlink restriction
HediffDef.description:
A hardware layer of mechlink capability limitations that applies to most Celestia. 

To facilitate life and work, in the Celestia's home system, Celestia will undergo a series of prosthetic modifications at birth, most of which can be automated by Dust-Mech, and the only one of which cannot be reproduced in Rimworlds at all is the Mechlink hub system. A portion of the new generation of Celestia born from the Rimworld may then not have mechlink capabilities. 

For Celestia who have the need for mechanical manipulation, in the past, it may only require a slight application. Nowadays, in order to lift this restriction, it may be necessary to use certain analogues from the Rimworld.
